SELECT DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID AS disposalFreezeEventUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, EVENT_CODE AS eventCode, EVENT_NAME AS eventName, EVENT_TYPE_UUID AS eventTypeUuid, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS reviewDate, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, END_YN AS endYN, REASON as reason,
AS terminatorUuid,
END_DATE AS endDate,
AS insertUuid,
INSERT_DATE AS insertDate,
AS updateUuid,
UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT WHERE 1=1
AND STATUS_UUID = #{statusUuid}
AND EVENT_CODE LIKE '%' || #{eventCode} || '%'
AND EVENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{eventName} || '%'
AND EVENT_TYPE_UUID = #{eventTypeUuid}
AND END_YN = #{endYN}
